markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with RDC | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Radulf | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_RDC_03 | guid = 20bef0ed-96dd-4171-9512-023eca61bc66 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Wakoyo has hired the Watcher to hunt down Burunga, a Huana captain in command of the dhow Pŵgra's Tooth. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * [Burunga](/burunga/) sails her dhow, ''[Pŵgra's Tooth](/pwgrasTooth/)'', around the Ofecchia Channel, far northeast of Neketaka and beyond the [Kua o Rikuhu Islands](/kuaORikuhuIslands/). The dhow is fairly well armed and staffed, making for a decent challenge. Return to Wakoyo after sinking it. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_RDC_03.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Burunga''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Fleet Master Wakoyo has hired me to hunt down Burunga, a Huana captain in command of the dhow Pŵgra's Tooth. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Burunga and take her ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Burunga sails her dhow, Pŵgra's Tooth, around the Ofecchia Channel, far northeast of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Fleet Master Wakoyo in the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Burunga's bounty is mine to claim. I can collect it from Wakayo at the Brass Citadel in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Burunga and claimed the reward for her bounty. |}
